name: Tuscan Herb Risotto Mix (Pack of 3)
summary: Everyone has one dish that they find daunting to make, and for many, that’s risotto. It’s easy to overcook or undercook it and end up with a disaster on your plate – until now. Master your Italian cooking skills by cooking rich and creamy risotto in the microwave – no pot to watch or constant stirring here! – in less than 20 minutes! Perfect for a date night at home or anytime you want to level up a weeknight dinner.
